mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id as cartId, c.user_id as userId, c.hospital_id as hospitalId, c.item_id as itemId, c.item_num as itemNum, c.create_time as createTime, i.`item_name` as itemName, d.`doctor_name` as doctorName, d.doctor_title as doctorTitle, h.`hospital_name` as hospitalName, i.item_image as itemImage, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(ic_name SEPARATOR '/') FROM item_class WHERE ic_id IN (i.`ic_id`)) AS itemClass FROM LEFT JOIN item i ON i.item_id=c.`item_id` LEFT JOIN hospital h ON c.`hospital_id`=h.`hospital_id` LEFT JOIN doctor d ON d.`doctor_id`=i.`doctor_id` WHERE c.user_id=#{userId} AND c.state=#{state}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cart_id, user_id, hospital_id, item_id, item_num, state) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{hospitalId}, #{itemId}, #{itemNum}, #{state});
